manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clear and Natural Sound Computer camera featured with Noise Reduction and Echo-canceling technology, high sensitivity mic enables you to enjoy a clear voice for hassle-free communication. Automatic Low Light Correction 1080P webcam with automatic low light correction and high dynamic range (HDR) technology, stream clear video even in dim light. so you always look your best on camera. Super Easy to Use Just plug and play, USB webcam get up and running immediately without having to install additional drivers. Simply connect this HD web camera 1080p to your computer.

High-Def Video Calling Web cam provides premium quality video that makes you like a pro, connect with everyone in FULL HD 1080P at a fluid 30 frames/sec. on most popular video calling apps. Suitable for Most Software Pro stream webcam supports Skype, Youtube, Facebook, XBOX one, OBS, Mixer, Xsplit, ZOOM, Hangouts, FaceTime, Twitter, Twitch, WhatsApp, Yahoo, MSN, Android IPTV, etc. 110 Degrees Wide-Angle view HD web camera with 110 degrees wide-angle, show friends more of you in 16:9 widescreen, easy to stream video, share your recorded videos or vblog. Perfect for conferencing, video calling, live streaming, recording, gaming...

1080P Webcam, Full HD 110° Widescreen Pro Streaming Web Camera 1080P Webcam, Built-in 3-Level Adjustable Light, 360 ° Rotation 4K Webcam, 8MP Ultra HD Streaming, Unique play/pause Function Resolution 1920x1080p 1920x1080p 3840x2160p Pixel 2MP 2MP 8MP Field of View 110° 90° 75° Focus Fixed Focus Fixed Focus Fixed Focus Connection USB-A USB-A USB-A Cable Length 6ft 6ft 6ft Compatibility Windows, Mac OS, Chrome OS, Android, etc Windows, Mac OS, Chrome OS, Android, etc Windows, Mac OS, Chrome OS, Android, etc Built-in Microphone ✓ ✓ ✓ Built-in Ring Light ✓ Privacy Cover and Tripod ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent Stock Camera For Home Use
reviews.reviewText: I needed a camera for a second home PC, and this one does the job. Good picture quality, easy to install. Runs just fine on Fedora 39 Linux - plug and play. Works fine with Skype, Zoom, Facebook Messenger, and others. No need to spend more for a functional, decent quality camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great picture quality for the price. No problems with audio and easy to plug into computer and use!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good picture quality
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera so I can keep my MacBook Pro cover closed to save room on my desk and make use of my large, curved monitor. As a pure camera, it works great and the set up was simple. I use Zoom and MS Teams for most of my video calls, and this camera was easy to find/configure with both of those apps. My only negative is the sound quality. When you use the camera, it also forces you to use the built in mic. I'd rather use my MacBook mic, but it won't let me when I use the camera. And the sound quality is a lot thinner and tinny. With Zoom I could enhance the sound a bit, but it's less quality than the MacBook provides. A nice addition is the flip cover, so you can maximize your security and blind the lens when you don't want it operational.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Camera Quality and pictures are good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars User error or poor interface with windows?
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace a built in camera that was not working consistently. When this unit works the quality of the picture is great, but it is very inconsistent in its functionality with virtual meetings. Not sure if it is user error, or set up issues, but it is very frustrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with my 3D Printer
reviews.reviewText: Easy to setup, works with my Neptune 4 Pro 3D printer. Probably wouldn't buy this for anything work related because the video quality sucks by today's standards, but for a budget cam keeping tabs on 3D prints it's great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible mic, inconsistent video
reviews.reviewText: Generally, this webcam has worked fine when using it for about 30 minutes at a time, but after that it either is marked as "USB device malfunctioned" or the video starts strobing and being completely unusable. After this happens, I have sometimes been able to fix it by unplugging the USB and plugging it back in, but more often than not, it just doesn't work at all as a video source. Also worth noting is that when I took the privacy cover off, it would take a few seconds to shift the lighting away from being a deeply purple saturated color. I am also not convinced that the video is 1080p, as it has nearly always been grainy enough that I could easily see the pixels especially around the edge of my face.The microphone is low enough quality that I have been informed nearly every time it defaults to being the audio source for my computer, and I have to manually change the source to my headphones which have a reasonably good microphone or built in computer audio when on my laptop. The first comment I got after getting the webcam was that it sounded like I was underwater.The microphone has been an issue since day 1, and the video worked for probably a month or 2 before starting to malfunction, being used at most once a week. The main redeeming quality is that the price was low enough that I don't feel terrible for having wasted $20 now that I'm going to buy another camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This webcam is awesome! It was super easy to set up with my laptop, and it works great!Much better quality than my HP laptop camera!
